channel.title: d3treeR on R que R
channel.description: Recent content in d3treeR on R que R

item.title: Data visualization: Treemaps with {treemap}, {d3treeR} and {highcharter}
item.description: This dashboard is a continuation of a previous post. In this occasion we will show how to create static treemaps using {treemap} and animated treemaps with {d3treeR} and {highcharter}.
